wikipedia_page.main: Lieutenant Colonel Neville Bowes Elliott-Cooper,  (22 January 1889 – 11 February 1918) was a British Army officer and an English recipient of the Victoria Cross, the highest award for gallantry in the face of the enemy that can be awarded to British and Commonwealth forces.
